thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 47 of 3642
thread.title: Rachel

author: Rachel
title: Rachel
text: I just found Thrift Books when searching for some hard to come by Children's books. Prices were incredible, I found some books I am NEVER able to find, and even the ones listed in less than great condition were in pretty good darn condition. There was one mix-up and I did not receive one book I ordered, and received a different one instead, and they are sending me my intended order free of charge. Overall a fantastic experience and I will shop here again!
